text: Aheibam () is a Meitei family. It is native to Ancient Kangleipak (Antique Manipur). People of this family mainly live in Manipur, India.http://www.mychildnames.com/mobile/surname- info.aspx?surname=Aheibamhttp://www.indiachildnames.com/mobile/surname.aspx?surname=Aheibamhttp://www.mychildnames.com/mobile/origin- of- surname.aspx?surname=Aheibamhttp://www.indiachildnames.com/mobile/originoffamilyname.aspx?surname=Aheibam == References == ==Other websites== * http://www.mychildnames.com/mobile/similar-surname.aspx?surname=Aheibam * http://www.indiachildnames.com/mobile/similarfamilyname.aspx?surname=Aheibam Category:Meitei surnames
title: Aheibam
